Pre-Game Insights: The Grizzlies are 2-2 against Southwest Division teams. Memphis ranks second in the NBA with 30.5 assists per game led by Desmond Bane averaging 5.2.
The Mavericks are 4-2 against the rest of the division.
The Grizzlies average 14.1 made 3-pointers per game this season, 1.2 more made shots on average than the 12.9 per game the Mavericks give up.
Others: Dallas Mavericks (20-15, sixth in the Western Conference) vs. Memphis Grizzlies (23-13, third in the Western Conference)
The game is scheduled to take place in Memphis, Tennessee on Monday, 8 p.m. EST

The article mentions injuries for both teams: Luke Kennard, Marcus Smart, John Konchar, Santi Aldama, Yuki Kawamura, Vince Williams Jr., Ja Morant, GG Jackson II for the Grizzlies, and Dante Exum, Luka Doncic, Kyrie Irving for the Mavericks
